description:
Kangaroo is a SQL client and admin tool.

Kangaroo is a AI-powered SQL client and admin tool for popular databases(MariaDB / MongoDB / MySQL / Oracle / PostgreSQL / Redis / SQLite / SQLServer / ...) on Windows / MacOS / Linux, support table design, query, model, sync, export/import etc, focus on comfortable, fun and developer friendly.
New features & bug-fixes
- Refactor connection dialog
- Add session and inhibit support
- Workspace add progress bar support
- MongoDB: Connection add URI support
- MongoDB: Connection discover server support
- MongoDB: Shard cluster support(Mongos / ReplicaSet / Config server)
- MongoDB: GridFS support(View with upload/download/preview/progress)
- MongoDB: Update aggregation stage documents
- MongoDB: Remove mapReduce menu item
- MongoDB: Improve log data
- MongoDB: Add query and truncate support
- MongoDB: Add maintain command support
- MongoDB: Rearrange toolbar items
- Update Chinese translation(zh-CN/zh-SG/zh-Hans/zh-Hant)
- Fixed: crash while get view columns
